message.entry: Failed to connect to hardware. Check device connection and driver installation.
Failed to initialize transport. Check network status and configuration, then retry the 'createVirtualPort' request.
Transport Initialization and Connect failed. Ensure network connection is alive and try to reconnect and re-request createVirtualPort.
Connection to hardware failed. Maximum connections reached. Disconnect current hardware to allow new connections.
Failed to connect to hardware. Try connecting again.
MATLAB is using the hardware. Close the current connection or switch hardware ports.
User rejected access to the requested port.
Allow MATLAB Online to access serial port {0}?
Allow MATLAB Online to access TCP address {0} on port {1}?
